== Rumbrem (626985) ==
      
Rumbrem is a village in the [[Sanguem]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 384 hectares and harbouring 131 households with total population of 646 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[CURCHOREM-CACORA]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 300 and female population is 346. Scheduled Caste Population is 11 and Scheduled Tribes population is 7. Census Location Code of the village is 626985<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
